lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Golden Landis Von Jones/Omer Fedi/Keegan Bach/Michael Olmo/LilGhost小鬼
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Golden Landis Von Jones/Omer Fedi/Keegan Bach/Michael Olmo/ LilGhost小鬼/陈令韬
[00:02.000] 编曲 : 陈令韬/大肥猫BFCat/顺德
[00:03.000] 制作人 : 陈令韬
[00:09.896]Lil Ghost：
[00:09.897]Why you always in a mood
[00:11.536]****in 'round, actin' brand new
[00:13.492]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[00:16.739]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[00:18.752]Everything look better with a view
[00:20.469]Why you always in a mood
[00:22.077]****in 'round, actin' brand new
[00:23.983]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[00:27.267]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[00:29.263]Everything look better with a view
[00:31.243]
[00:31.244]Lil Ghost:
[00:31.245]Oh my girl girl girl
[00:33.572]只想陪你品尝所有的苦涩
[00:36.434]I say no no no
[00:38.915]拜托你别再忽冷忽热
[00:41.298]从过去到了现在
[00:43.084]哥们儿依旧稳定发力
[00:44.671]都什么年代
[00:45.609]也不是不能离开你
[00:47.292]我这种天菜
[00:48.386]不要太受女孩欢迎
[00:50.664]Tell me how can I be your moonlight
[00:53.055]
[00:53.056]Iann Dior:
[00:53.057]We play games of love to avoid the depression
[00:57.921]We been here before and I won’t be your victim
[01:02.643]
[01:02.644]24KGoldn：
[01:02.644]Why you always in a mood
[01:04.260]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[01:06.172]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[01:09.491]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[01:11.445]Everything look better with a view
[01:13.105]Why you always in a mood
[01:14.768]F**Kin’ ‘round actin’ brand new
[01:16.712]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[01:19.973]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[01:21.959]Everything look better with a view
[01:24.101]
[01:24.102]So why you tryin' to fake your love on the regular
[01:26.969]When you could be blowin' up just like my cellular
[01:29.541]I won't ever let a shorty go and set me up
[01:32.290]Only thing I need to know is if you wet enough
[01:34.733]I'm talking slik back, kick back, gang sippin' fourties
[01:37.877]You keep playin, not another day with you shorty
[01:40.552]Mismatched fits that was way before you know me
[01:43.131]Got a lot of love, well you better save it for me
[01:45.778]
[01:45.779]Lil Ghost:
[01:45.780]Touch my soul
[01:47.442]Every time 你想走When I lose control
[01:50.075]Baby I know you can touch my soul
[01:52.587]When I say love you love you love you
[01:55.000]
[01:55.364]Why you always in a mood
[01:56.911]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[01:58.951]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[02:02.226]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[02:04.215]Everything look better with a view
[02:05.852]Why you always in a mood
[02:07.436]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[02:09.439]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[02:12.724]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[02:14.698]Everything look better with a view
[02:17.260]
[02:17.404]She wanna say
[02:18.058]她太过冷漠需要点energy（能量）
[02:19.807]What can I do
[02:20.604]我搞不清楚这是个好问题
[02:22.619]ごめんなさい(I’m sorry)
[02:23.225]我了解万物但不了解你
[02:25.208]就别再折磨我
[02:27.708]爷给你的爱不够用 请你丢进垃圾堆
[02:32.934]也就算背后跟朋友骂我也无所谓
[02:37.520]Baby I know you can touch my soul
[02:40.057]Every time 你想走When I lose control
[02:42.703]Baby I know you can touch my soul
[02:45.377]When I say love you love you love you
[02:48.066]
[02:48.067]24KGlodn&Lil Ghost：
[02:48.068]Why you always in a mood
[02:49.695]F**Kin’ ‘round actin’ brand new
[02:51.680]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[02:54.922]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[02:56.930]Everything look better with a view
[02:58.513]Why you always in a mood
[03:00.224]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[03:02.179]I ain’t tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[03:05.480]Baby I ain’t playing by your rules
[03:07.464]Everything look better with a view
[03:08.571] 录音师：李宗远@Studio21A
[03:09.678] 音频编辑：李宗远@Studio21A
[03:10.785] 混音/母带工程师：周天澈@Studio21A

[03:12.999] 艺人统筹：黄泳涵/Roger Tsang/赵博洋

tlyric:
[00:09.896]
[00:09.897]为何你总是心情不悦
[00:11.536]四处游转 却焕然新面目
[00:13.492]我不愿对你指手划脚 但却会镇定地说
[00:16.739]亲爱的 我才不会因你 而循规蹈矩
[00:18.752]敞开新视野 一切将会更美好

[00:31.244]
[00:31.245]（哦我的女孩）
[00:33.572]
[00:36.434]（我说不不不）
[00:38.915]
[00:41.298]
[00:43.084]
[00:44.671]

[00:47.292]
[00:48.386]
[00:50.664]（告诉我怎样才能成为你心中的月光）
[00:53.055]
[00:53.056]
[00:53.057]你我共耍爱情游戏 只为避免抑郁
[00:57.921]曾经我们共度过 如今我不会再因你而受伤

[01:24.101]
[01:24.102]所以为何你总是佯装真心爱我
[01:26.969]当你本该勃然大怒 犹如手机轰炸不停
[01:29.541]我才不会令自己深陷 为你所困顿
[01:32.290]我唯独想知道 你是否足够尽兴
[01:34.733]其实是想表达杯酒交错 纵享欢愉
[01:37.877]你若仍继续当作儿戏 我定不会再长久陪伴你
[01:40.552]在你我相识之前 其实就已不般配
[01:43.131]你最好将无限的爱意 都献予给我
